subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Marian Gaborik scored with seven seconds left in regulation and again in overtime to lift the Kings to a win over the Ducks in the teams’ first playoff series against each other.
snippet: Marian Gaborik scored with seven seconds left in regulation and again in overtime to lift the Kings to a win over the Ducks in the teams’ first playoff series against each other.
